thread.section_title: FolderPrinters.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FolderPrinters.com | folderprinters.com
thread.title: Elise Blomer

author: Elise Blomer
title: Elise Blomer
text: As soon as I started to look into folders, Folder Printers immediately sent me a sample kit - which made it easy for me to see what I'd be getting. I called with questions and they were answered knowledgeably with the idea planted that I could call back if I had more questions. When they designed my folder, I made changes twice - and they did it without question. The folders were shipped and received quickly and I love the way they look. I would say that I could have got them cheaper elsewhere, but the samples and their willingness to talk me through the process was worth the extra cost. Compared to other companies I shopped, this one actually seemed to WANT my business.
